meanings.definition: Of or relating to the iris of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The iridal colors in her eyes changed with her emotions.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the iridal patterns to determine her health.
meanings.sent3: He joked that her iridal hues could hypnotize anyone.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with iridal shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the iridal beauty of the eye in his painting.

meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with iridal flowers of various colors.
meanings.sent2: The fabric had an iridal pattern that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: She found an iridal umbrella that matched her style perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The soap bubbles shimmered with iridal reflections in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The peacock's feathers displayed an iridal sheen under the bright lights.
